title: Steel Partners Offers $18 Per Share for 51% of InMode
description: Steel Partners Holdings LP has made an offer to buy a majority stake in InMode Ltd., which makes devices for minimally invasive body treatments.
content: Steel Partners Holdings LP has made an offer to buy a majority stake in InMode Ltd., which makes devices for minimally invasive body treatments.
